name: Sklearn K-Means
description: K-Means clustering algorithm using scikit-learn. K-Means falls in the general category of clustering algorithms, which partition observations into groups based on similarity without using labels.
input: It takes in a DataFrame as input
output: Outputs cluster centers, labels, and metrics such as inertia

fields.name: n_clusters
fields.title: Number of Clusters
fields.description: The number of clusters to form and centroids to generate.

fields.name: featuresCols
fields.title: Feature Columns
fields.description: Features to be used for clustering.

fields.name: init
fields.title: Initialization Mode
fields.description: Method for initialization: 'k-means++' for smart initialization to speed up convergence, 'random' to choose n_clusters observations at random.

fields.name: n_init
fields.title: Number of Initializations
fields.description: Number of times the k-means algorithm will run with different centroid seeds. The best output is chosen based on inertia.

fields.name: max_iter
fields.title: Max Iterations
fields.description: Maximum number of iterations for a single run of the k-means algorithm.

fields.name: tol
fields.title: Tolerance
fields.description: Relative tolerance with regards to Frobenius norm of the difference in cluster centers to declare convergence.

fields.name: verbose
fields.title: Verbose
fields.description: Verbosity mode: 0 for silent, 1 for verbose output.

fields.name: random_state
fields.title: Random State
fields.description: Seed for random number generation to ensure deterministic results. Leave empty for non-deterministic behavior.

fields.name: copy_x
fields.title: Copy X
fields.description: If true, the original data is not modified during pre-computation of distances. If false, data may be modified but restored.

fields.name: algorithm
fields.title: Algorithm
fields.description: K-means algorithm: 'full' for classical EM-style, 'elkan' for a more efficient variation using the triangle inequality, 'auto' to choose based on data.

fields.name: saveCentroidsPath
fields.title: Save Centroids Path
fields.description: Path to save cluster centroids as CSV.

fields.name: output_cluster_centers
fields.title: Output Cluster Centers
fields.description: Whether to output the cluster centers as a table.
